bgu.dcr.az.api

Class Agent.PlatformOps

  • java.lang.Object
    • bgu.dcr.az.api.Agent.PlatformOps
  • Enclosing class:
    Agent

    public class Agent.PlatformOps
extends java.lang.Object
    this class contains all the "hidden but public" methods, because the user should extend the agent class all the "platform" operations can be called mistakenly by him, instead of making those operations private and then access them via reflection - which will create a decrease in the performance - we just hide them in this inner class. One private object of this class are held by each agent. In order for the platform to obtain this instance it uses another inner class 'PlatformOperationsExtractor' this class contains a static method that extracts the private field - because it's also defined inside the agent it doesn't have to use reflection to do so.

      • setId

        public void setId(int id)
        set the agent id - this method is called by the execution environment to set the agent id and should not be called by hand / by an algorithm implementer this function should only be called once and will throw Repeated Calling Exception upon repeated calls. ** if you need to change the mail group do it before setting the id as setting the id will register the agent to the mailer with it known mail group key
        Parameters:
        id -

      • getExecution

        public Execution getExecution()
        Returns:
        the Execution object - this is the object that connects the agent to the execution environment most of the time the algorithm implementer will not have to deal with this object it is mostly here for advance users / tool implementers

      • getMailGroupKey

        public java.lang.String getMailGroupKey()
        Returns:
        the current agent mail group key (current implementation will just return the class name but it should get changed in later implementations)

        public void configure(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> vars)
